com.MASTAdView
Class MASTAdRequest

java.lang.Object
  com.MASTAdView.MASTAdRequest

public final class MASTAdRequest
extends java.lang.Object

Class encapsulating all of the data and parameters associated with an ad server request. The key parameters needed to retrieve ads from the back-end (such as site, zone, ad width, ad height, etc) may be set and retrieved via the getProperty() and setProperty() methods below. The Mocean UI back-end supports a variety of additional parameters. Any of these additional parameters can be set via the "generic" custom parameters object, below.

Field Detail

parameter_site

public static final java.lang.String parameter_site
The id of the publisher site, obtained from the Mocean customer account representative. THIS IS A REQUIRED VALUE.

See Also:
Constant Field Values

parameter_zone

public static final java.lang.String parameter_zone
Publisher zone for an ad placement in an application. Obtained from the Mocean customer account representative or created via the Mocean UI. THIS IS A REQUIRED VALUE.

See Also:
Constant Field Values

parameter_userAgent

public static final java.lang.String parameter_userAgent
User agent string to identify the device/os on which an application is running. This will be set to the value typically sent by the device web browser by default. Do not change this unless you have a good reason to do so.

See Also:
Constant Field Values

parameter_size_x

public static final java.lang.String parameter_size_x
Maximum width of ad to be requested from server. The SDK will set this automatically based on the ad view properties, but the developer can override it.

See Also:
Constant Field Values

parameter_size_y

public static final java.lang.String parameter_size_y
Maximum height of ad to be requested from server. The SDK will set this automatically based on the ad view properties, but the developer can override it.

See Also:
Constant Field Values

parameter_version

public static final java.lang.String parameter_version
SDK version. This is set automatically by the SDK. DO NOT CHANGE THIS VALUE (CONSIDER IT READ ONLY.)

See Also:
Constant Field Values

parameter_ad_server_url

public static final java.lang.String parameter_ad_server_url
URL of ad server this ad view will use when communicating with back end. The default value is set for the Mocean Mobile ad server. DO NOT CHANGE THIS VALUE UNLESS YOU KNOW WHAT YOU ARE DOING.

See Also:
Constant Field Values

parameter_latitude

public static final java.lang.String parameter_latitude
User location latitude value (given in degrees.decimal degrees). Can be set directly by the app, or can be set from GPS by enabling location detection.

See Also:
Constant Field Values

parameter_longitude

public static final java.lang.String parameter_longitude
User location longitude value (given in degrees.decimal degrees). Can be set directly by the app, or can be set from GPS by enabling location detection.

See Also:
Constant Field Values

parameter_test

public static final java.lang.String parameter_test
Test mode flag, for requesting test ads from server. OPTIONAL, defaults to OFF.

See Also:
Constant Field Values

parameter_ad_request

public static final java.lang.String parameter_ad_request
Custom parameter map which can be used to send arbitrary key/value pairs to the back-end. The custom parameter value is a Map managed by the application developer.

See Also:
Constant Field Values
